accessCode.description: Label for the access code entry box

accessCodeTimer.message: This access code will expire in
accessCodeTimer.description: Text preceding the access code timer

debugButton.description: Label for the debug log button

descriptionConnect.message: Have the user whose computer you wish to access click ‘Share this computer’ and then have them read their access code to you.

descriptionShare.message: With Chromoting you can easily let another Chrome user see and control your computer.

disconnectButton.description: Label for the debug log button

emailLabel.description: Label to the left of the user's email address

errorInvalidAccessCode.description: Error displayed if an invalid access code is entered

errorMissingPlugin.message: The viewer plugin is missing or out-of-date. Please upgrade to a more recent version of Chrome.
errorMissingPlugin.description: Error displayed if the client plugin fails to load

errorNoResponse.message: Failed to get response from server.
errorNoResponse.description: Error displayed if an XHR request comes back empty

errorOAuthFailed.message: Unable to fetch OAuth2 token. Try revoking the token and authenticating again.
errorOAuthFailed.description: Error displayed if the OAuth2 token cannot be refreshed

footerClient1.description: Instructions to switch to host mode (first part, before the hyperlink--can be empty)

footerClient2.description: Instructions to switch to host mode (second part, hyperlinked--must not be empty)

footerClient3.description: Instructions to switch to host mode (third part, after the hyperlink--can be empty)

footerCrOS.message: Currently Hosting is not supported on Chromebooks. Hosting is supported on Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.
footerCrOS.description: Footer text displayed on ChromeOS in lieu of the mode switch hyperlink

footerHost1.description: Instructions to switch to client mode (first part, before the hyperlink--can be empty)

footerHost2.description: Instructions to switch to client mode (second part, hyperlinked--must not be empty)

footerHost3.description: Instructions to switch to client mode (third part, after the hyperlink--can be empty)

footerWaiting.description: Footer text at the host when waiting for a client to connect

instructionsShareAbove.message: To begin sharing your desktop, read out the access code below to the person who will be assisting you.
instructionsShareAbove.description: Instructions shown above the access code when it is ready to be conveyed to the client

instructionsShareBelow.message: Once they enter the code your sharing session will begin.
instructionsShareBelow.description: Instructions shown below the access code when it is ready to be conveyed to the client

labelConnected.description: String displayed in front of the host in the in-session toolbar

messageGenerating.description: Text shown while generating an access code

messageSessionFinished.message: You are no longer connected to the remote desktop.
messageSessionFinished.description: Message displayed when the client has (been) disconnected

messageShared.message: Your desktop is currently being shared with $USER$.
messageShared.description: Message shown on the host computer while a session is active

oauth2TokenLabel.description: Label to the left of the authenticate/revoke button

unableToGetToken.description: Error message displayed if an access token could not be generated

verifyingCode.description: Message displayed while the access code is verified
